text: An idea of possibly opening up the reporting api's used for pulling stats in HS. This would allow us to create integrations into things like Google's Data Studio and more. I know there are ways to get data currently but they aren't exactly official api's. I know that Databox has an integration to HS so I am trying to see how they are able to get those stats when there is no public api for it

Has anyone ever run across issues with forms being forced to reload on ios? I found someone else in the forums with the same issue and was curious if anyone here had dealt with it. Hereâ€™s the post -<https://integrate.HubSpot.com/t/ios-form-submission-always-reloads-page/430>
I don't have time to work on this, this week, but i'm wondering if you could do some return false inside your onsubmit, or possibly add a listener to whatever is causing the page reload.
and try prevent default on that
I'd be interested in looking at it next week some time, not sure if you could send me some stripped down code so I could attempt in xcode / ios and see if I can debug through it
